ACattailDipper: What is is we are willing to believe, to comprehend, to accept? We deny many things, and praise many blindly. When in fact, they all are wrong. Or they are all ludicrous. We don't question. Or we do and get judged by our fellow man. When, it all comes down to it. We are all just ripples in the water. It doesn't matter what we say or do for long, for there will always be something or someone to take our place, to speak in our position. Weather we like it or not. Ji watches this and thinks. Ji looks at us and sees. Ji, thinks the the things we do and say are like cat tails. Find out why.
AChildsGrimmAlexandraandTheHollowMan: A coming-of-age story about a lost girl named Alex Liddell, whose fate intertwines with a cursed man and his family. AChristmasEveStory: "I believe in Santa...but maybe I'm wrong." A short but sweet story about a little girl and her encounter with Father Christmas.
ADaywithmyDads: This is a seven page comic I did for a class. The quality is very low because I did it in a week. It's supposed to somewhat show hoe gay couples can can have happy families just like straight couples and how even children can accept it.
ADemonsWish: Shigenori Takenaka's life was perfectly fine. ADoodleADay: As an alternative to a diary or anything boring like that, I'm doing a comic. On the back of a page-a-day calendar, here are the stupid thoughts that go through my head on a daily basis. (Some characters may be imaginary because I didn't want to offend real people by drawing them). Just jump in anywhere, there's one case of continuity in the last year. All you actually need to know is that I'm in uni, and play a lot of games. A comic a day, almost guaranteed! (I might still be five pages behind, but I'm hoping to fix that). The start is a little sticky because I didn't start the project until part way through January. The first few pages were done throughout the year with left over ideas. Please note, this is a year behind. So everything relates to last year, hence some of the out of date content.
AFeralTale: Yaoi! In space! Yay! Captain Raze despises Feral's. And he does not agree with the space station's policy of allowing them to commute from earth even doing low level jobs. Absolution: Lunerum; a city in the back of beyond, is a place filled with unwanted neighbours. Two factions fight for dominance in an underground turf war which isn't kept so underground, and the people live in fear of the powers they wield. A 200 year old grudge and bad publicity can do that. A long history of fear and prejudice against them is justified, right? Not necessarily, as violent policewoman Ruth McGillan, Psychopomp Valerie King, and waitress Shara Lombard are about to find out. Any of their original preconceptions are about to be thrown out of the window, but can they survive the fallout which will follow? This comic will contain LGBTAQ material, and will also contain violence, gore and explicit language, but not enough to- in my opinion- make it M rated. My maximum update time is 12 days. This comic reads right to left Comments always make my day!

AcidMonday: REPRINT PREORDERS OPEN!! http://igg.me/at/acidmondayreprint/x/197012 PAGES FROM THE NEW CHAPTER POST EVERY TUESDAY + FRIDAY DURING THE FUNDRAISER. Before, Clover only knew Monday as the local acid addict. This changes after Clover snaps at him in the boy's bathroom. As fate would have it, Clover's mother forces him into a job at her rehab clinic as a mentor for none other than Monday. Is it fate bringing them together or is there some ulterior motive for the acidhead being at the clinic? Acid Monday was created on March 14, 2008, and completed January 19, 2010. This comic is rated 18+, though the main comic that is available online only has a handful of explicit pages. (The extra material in the book is NSFW) Other warnings also apply: drug addiction references, swearing, brief blood and violence, and gay sex yes. Please note that I made this comic when I was 17 and hadn't done a lot of research on LSD (acid) as an addiction. Turns out LSD isn't particularly addictive or as dangerous as some other drugs. The name sounded good though, so I went with it. ;D Just think of Monday's "addiction" as a delusional catalyst for a silly boys love comic.

AdrenalineRush: Meet Shawn Toms. At his school, he's the epitome of what every single guy wants to be: track star extraordinaire, shining personality, all the right friends, hot girlfriend, rich parents. He's got a quirk; his "unnatural" obsession with the accursed "Art Room," and his difficulty leaving it alone. But that's only minor. Until, a lightning bolt and a shot of adrenaline leave Shawn with a little problem of uncontrollable super-speed. Unable to run track anymore, Shawn decides that this is the perfect opportunity to test out this art thing that he can't shake off. However likable the rest of the school finds him, though, Shawn can't break through to the Kings of the Art Room: Andy Evans and Grase Antoinette. Not only are they unbearably against Shawn being anywhere near their haven, but these two have secrets of their own: secrets that Shawn would have never expected out of his own halls. Secrets that could very possibly rock his world harder than his problem, and that could shatter his fragile popularity, forcing him to fall from grace. (Contains BL. It doesn't kick in for a little bit, but it'll be there)

They must travel to the four temples and ask forgiveness from the season gods. They are like fire and ice but on this journey they must learn to forgive each other as well as accept each other. AtrumViator: Vorago, with the intention of completing her master's work, seeks out an ancient demonic artifact. She invests little into the myths of the past and does not believe in any form of higher power... That is, until she experiences it for herself. Having recovered the artifact, she attracts the interest of another client. She goes it alone and delves into the swamp in search of what the client seeks, encountering a deity who curses her and her home. Now she seeks a means to shed the curse from this world.
AttackonDragons: Vikings. Meet the dragons. Huge Dragons. Comic Updates: Every other Tuesday! Content Contains: Strong Violence Strong Language Boys Love ( 18+ later in Chapters )

[updates every Sunday] Autophobia is also available on InkBlazers with coloured pages! Updates every Tuesday & Thursday. BehindTheObsidianMirror: If you were to awake in a place unknown to you, without remembering anything... you would be happy to be taken in by someone, right? But what if this someone was a god? Although I have read a lot about Aztecs and their culture and mythology, I am hardly an expert on that subject. So forgive everything that might be off, or wrong, since I actually don't bother to get everything right or just change things to my liking. The Aztecs and their religion etc. depicted in this comic are far from realistic, and don't aim to be, although I'm trying to make it all seem plausible. Just so you know. BittersweetSepia: Celeste looks towards the past, Ange looks towards the future, yet each always tries to drag the other in the opposite direction. How will two friends on different wavelengths learn to unite their strengths? The clock is ticking towards an answer...
Bl3: Mostly a crossover of BLEACH and BLAZBLUE (the title may be read as "bl3" or "bleablazblue") All characters here are the property of either Tite Kubo or Arc Systems Works, particularly Toshimichi Mori. There is one original character, but half of that is owned by Daisuke Ishiwatari. This takes place between the Deicide and Lost Agent arcs of BLEACH. Please read RIGHT TO LEFT, like a Japanese manga.
BlackAxis: Upon the strange monthly appearance of the Blood Moon, mysterious beings have stalked the alleyways, looking for people to hunt. Set in a world where strict hierarchy and prejudice reigns, the less fortunate must struggle to survive in an increasingly dangerous world. When demon-like shapeshifters known as "Axis" start mysteriously appearing, those without shelter have nowhere to hide. This story follows the lives of several people and their struggles for survival in troubled times, as well as finding love and acceptance with those least expected. **Contains BL & occasional violence/gore** -If you don't like reading a whole bunch of random crap, please skip the prologue. The paragraphs above is a basic summary of the entire prologue.-
BlackDragon: Since mankind has subjugated dragons, men struggle for power by using dragons. Sora also wants to become a dragonrider and so he climbs the Dragon-Mountains to catch a dragon This is a manga. Read from the right to the left! If you can't wait, you can get the complete Manga on Amazon: http://www.amazon.com/dp/B007NZGBZ8 http://www.amazon.com/dp/B009MOQLLM http://www.amazon.com/dp/B00BRJHPTW http://www.amazon.com/dp/B00EMHWJVK Update: one chapter per month
BlackGate: Ryae goes into the military looking to be the new king's adviser and looking for an easy life, but nothing goes according to plan. It turns out that getting to this 'easy life' is more involved than she bargained for.
BlackListed: After Juliet Whitney is expelled from St Chaplin High, she isn’t sure she will ever get into college. But without notice, her parents manage to procure a graduation diploma, and she is shipped off to England to attend Blackwood University. It is a University that she has never heard of, and she hasn’t the slightest inclination of how her parents were able to get her in, but she doesn’t question it. She plans on lying low, but it is clear from her first day at Blackwood University that this is not an ordinary school and terrible secrets riddle its halls. A group of top students rule the school, but not for their wealth and intellect. They are feared, and they call themselves NEMESIS. In this school, revenge and blackmail rule, and NEMESIS carries it out. No one is safe, especially Juliet. She has her own secrets to protect, and no one can be trusted. But despite her attempts to lay low, she finds herself sucked into the world of blackmail where more than just her secrets lay at stake.
BlackOval: Davis Vinson is the lead singer of the band Black Oval. Always being the bad-boy type, and struggling from a background of drugs, death, and a broken family, he leans on his band mates to try to keep him on the right path. He stumbles upon a girl, Shane Alexander, who might be just as bad as him... but in all the right ways. ----------- Boy X Girl comic. Coming of age story, sprinkled with romance, humor, and lot of arrogance and bad attitude XD Rated M for mature: Language, Sexual themes (sexual encounters later), drugs, etc. ------------ On Updates: I will try to update once a week, though that will vary. I have a shoulder problem on my drawing arm that I am getting treatment for, so on good weeks, I will hopefully have multiple pages up, and on bad weeks I may not get to publish any at all. Any comments are welcome! Thank you for stopping by.
BlackRing: Victory is a Reality TV Show star, the queen of "bra kingdom" as she like to call it. Her 3rd season is now over and she has a rendez-vous. With Samson. Her childhood friend. Samson is a good guy. Once upon a time, he fell in love with Victory, his friend at school. But one day, Victory and her family move out of town. She promise that 15 years away from now, they will meet again.
BlackSheepWhiteSheep: In a grove in no particular place in no particular time. There are 5 pastures of merry little ship. By the day they are quiet normal and white, but by night their fleece changes and shows each of them to be unique. Corbin unfortunaly, is the black sheep, though his horns are golden, his stigma still sticks with him. Plus it seems as though he has no abilities or unique talents. As Corbin grew he became use to his life of social seclusion, but what happens when a popular some find interest in him, furthermore happens when they find out his true hidden ability. Updates are whenever I get to it. I have to make money and pay bills somehow. but dun worry I'll try to keep it updated often (^-^)<3

Visit blacksheep.inkblazers.com for updates every week. Read left to right. ------------------------
BlackandBlue: A sci-fi fairytale. A boys nightmare. So, this is about an Evil Empire soldier with a few problems... not the least of which is a slight gender issue and a weird entanglement with an astronaut. Awkwardness ensues. D: I thought "The Crying Game" was a comedy, you've been warned. Ha! e_e Also I started this about 200 years ago and the art is pretty rough I'M SO SORRY! ;_; FORGIVE ME!
Blackdemon: everyone has a demon inside them, even the nicest people in the world has a demon. what happens if the demon inside takes total control of you? it could effect your life style, personality, and for artist's; imagination. that's what this comic is about. a girl with poor social skills and a large imagination, how will she fix both problems? (WARNING:some chapters in this comic are based on real events that occurred in the author's life) comic updates:Monday's, Wednesday's, and Friday's(if not updated, that means i got a LOT of HW or my laptop is damaged)
BlanccommeNeige: A story about two women and one man in USSR.
BlankSlate: For fifteen years, Ezra has dealt with the company of Alvaeros; a mysterious demon that cannot be seen or heard by anyone else and whose origin/purpose is kept hidden. He started to ask questions, but after experiencing a traumatic event five years ago, Ezra's current and only wish is to live a normal life while pursuing happiness the best way he can. Still, even the best kept secrets have a way of getting out... | Updates every Saturday |
BlazingInfernosWillsFireredNuzlocke: Will starts his journey through the pokemon journey, filled with, laughs, sadness, and typical descriptions! He begins his journey through Kanto, but finds that strange things are happening, not in a normal firered nuzlocke. RULES: 1. If a pokemon faints, it is considered dead and must be released (Boxing is for wusses). 2. Only the first pokemon seen in any given route/area may be caught. 3. No buying items (not including pokeballs) from a pokemart or vendor. Items found or recived for free are legal. 1ST AMENDMENT-No buying HEALING items all other items (such as TMs and repel) are legal 4. No breeding, however, the daycare center is allowed. 5. The box is banned. Once a full team is reached, no pokemon may be caught until a member dies The unspoken rule: pokemon must be nicknamed. This is not your normal nuzlocke
BleachRedux: Myself and others were extremely disappointed with Ulquiorra's death in the official Bleach manga, so I've taken it upon myself to draw out what could've possibly happened had Orihime pulled her head out of her ass and saved him. WARNING: UlquiHime. Any negative comments (or futile attempts at validating other ships that make even less sense (ie: IchiHime)) will be deleted. NOTE: READ RIGHT TO LEFT LIKE JAPANESE MANGA.
BleachandCloth: Burlesque and Islam living together (albeit in a talking heads comic strip but why sweat the details)... Bleach is a Religious Studies major working her way through college as a burlesque dancer. Cloth is a 'white bread' hijabi Muslimah in college for Art History. Together they are roommates who because they are so different couldn't help but find how they are alike. Focusing on their similarities (such as how they both love comics, video games, and anime) rather than differences (such as bra size) they become fast friends. And by friends I mean they talk $#!+ about each other more than a chimp in the zoo flings poo. However, if anyone else talks crapola about the one than the other quickly got their back. PS Beware of Teddy Interruptions (cute little teddy bears stuffed with sin) and Mufti/Sheikh/imam (all self given titles) Squid Beard self described (noticing a pattern here?) fatwas not endorsed by the Muslim community at large!!! Oh and before you ask, "Why did the creator decide to name them Bleach and Cloth?" Let me say, "How the Jahannam should I know I am just a disembodied narrator voice!"
Bleeding3Heart: ----- Jaden, a 17 year old boy who has always had it rough, is kidnaped by a vampire who says he needs him for blood. turns out this might be the best thing to ever happen to jaden... ---- Warings: Mature content such as; sex,drugs,violance, and all that good shit xD --- other links http://www.inkblazers.com/manga-and-comics/Bleeding-3-Heart/detail-page/7566?lang=en http://theduckwebcomics.com/Bleeding_Heart/ http://comicfury.com/comicprofile.php?url=Bleeding-Heart
BleedingHeart: If you didn't know, bleeding heart is a flower. Also, so I can update faster, I'm going to use a thicker brush and faster/sloppier lines. I'm also going to color code the hair and eyes. Well... enjoy!
BlindandBlue: Boy's Love! (Gay relationship romance) Caecus (Case) woke up one morning to find that he was completely blind. He's picked on by the school bully, and things aren't so great. Fortunately for Case, he finds a friend - and eventually a boyfriend - in the new kid, Darryl, and together they make it through the things life throws at them. A smackjeeves mirror to the comic on DrunkDuck, which you can read [url=http://www.drunkduck.com/Case_1048_Blind_and_Blue/]here[/url] Comic contains swearing very rarely,so if you don't like it...you'll be fine actually And if you're homophobic...message me with your reasons why as I am very curious on the topic.
BloodBlue: Eyes as cold as ice, and in a voice so utterly devoid of emotion, the man - the demon - looked down on him and said: "From now on, you belong to me. You are my dog. You are mine." Hard-BL/ Mature/ Violent/ Yakuza themes
BloodCandy: Leona Levi, who has reawaken as a vampire, has become amnesiac about who she was before the conversion. While getting used to her new night life-style, will she ever get ahold of the inklings of her former self and find the identity of her creator who had abandoned her?
BloodhuntersBirthofavampire: .In a world full of vampires and monsters only the hunters can protect the humans. Their job's to eliminate everything that seem to be dangerous. Bloodline: Ember struggles to avoid her family's cult history, while trying to unravel why magic is slowly fading away
BloodyUrban: Meet Murray. He's living on the other side of the world, unsure of himself, stuck in a job he doesn't particularly like, and is unfortunately also a werwolf. This is the story of his life, his friends and their rather bizarre misadventures. It's got a few vampires in it, but we're pretty sure it's better than Twilight. Maybe.
Bloodycious: Year X-2131. End of the confederation's war. The winning N.O.R.D. Confederation enact a new law. T.P. are the dregs of society. Inquisitors vanished without a trace.
Bloodyfairytale: Contains (yaoi, boylove, blood and others) I will only update once a week from now on. : ) But if I have time and energy to it, I will update twice a week.
BloomaPokemonConquestComic: According to the Legend of the Ransei region, if all 17 kingdoms of the region are united, the legendary Pokemon that formed the region would appear. Young Saku, along with her stubborn Axew, set off on the road of conquest. However, the warlord Nobunaga is only one kingdom away from uniting the region. Can Saku conquer Ransei before he does? ______________ There is a bit of violence later on, but hey, Pokemon has a certain lack of violence that they need to make up for. Nothing too bad. Also, I am constantly improving, so please ignore the bad art at the beginning. >.< Pokemon (c) Nintendo Updates Wednesdays and Saturdays. **Temporarily updating irregularly-see news for more details
BloomingGlory: Currently posting every other day People are required to have a license at the age of ten, a Pokemon escort is needed to safely travel anywhere, and corruption is brewing while both potential Champions are absent. Despite her fears, Glory is thrown into the outside world with a weak Cyndaquil and a mission.
BlueBayou: The little town of Blue Bayou is nestled deep into the swamp of what used to be Louisiana, a quiet place where no one is out of the ordinary ... Except for all of the disappearances in the surrounding swamp over the years ... Follow the story of Adrianna Le Roux and the strange young man that she finds floundering about in the swamp in this story of love, blood and cannibalism.
BlueDiamond: Updates every Thursday & Sometimes Saturdays too
BlueLove: CURRENTLY UPDATING WITH THE ENGLISH VERSION. Got into the finals, but I did not win <_< I have decided to keep going until I win LOL So please give me some comments! Title: Blue Love Synopsis: Because of her poor family status, Ran got into the only noble school in the city with the help of scholarships, and she pretends to be a guy and go out with girls on dates to earn her living expenses. However, the student council president seems to be quite interested in her... (NOTE: THIS IS A ONE-SHOT MANHUA)
BlueMarble: A story about a little planet called Earth. :Update every Sunday:
BlueSkiesandWhiteClouds: In the past of a magical world the infamous Azure Thief steals an orb from a witch for his own endeavors. Being pursued, he travels to a rural town where all seems at a loss. No one hears of him again until 500 years later a young girl named Amy finds the orb. It is Amy's last summer of freedom before college and all seems at a loss. In a last effort to save her summer, she pursues an old project. These two souls are about to be intertwined in an unimaginable way and their lives will forever be changed by the orb.
BlueWell: Leif Kavanaugh grew up in the country-side and came to the city to attend college. He moves into "The Blue Well" boarding home, which houses several other college students just like himself. While he hopes everything will go smoothly, Leif learns it's not the city that makes life crazy, it's the people.
Bluthund: Clinton Bluthund is a super-smart private detective whose best friend is a canine mutt named Sykke. Together, they will work to solve various cases. But one figure seems to be behind them all.... Updates Fridays **On temporary hiatus--see news** Story by sakohju and Charlotte Potter Script by Charlotte Potter Artwork by sakohju ________ Disclaimer: Slightly related to BBC's Sherlock, but all characters (and canines) are original.
BoilingPointofBrain: The company 'Brain' is going through terrible waves of financial depression as their only client 'Erika' has succumbed to the roadblocks in life. It is up to Sir and the Intern as well as the employees to help their client get back up on her feet.
BokutoGHOST: Boku to GHOST ("ghost and I") is a one-shot comic created to take on portfolio reviews to editors at comic publishing companies while I was in Japan for a month in fall 2010. story summary: Takuya died before he was able to experience the adolescence he really wanted... so he comes back as a ghost and forces his childhood friend Hideto to experience it for him. but their ideas of what is important in life turn out to be just a little different... next page is put up every Saturday. comic reads R-to-L.
Boned: A comedy about four gay guys and a parrot surviving NYC on Halloween weekend. It's weird. Updates every Sunday. Main site: http://bonedcomic.com Tumblr: http://bonedcomic.tumblr.com/
BoobLand: Imagine a world where almost everything has boobs... and you're there! Okay, well not you. But Steve is! Explore this strange world with Steve as he Travels around Boobland.
BoogeyDancingMonkeyPot: A story about a race of dark creatures known as Boogey men. Their world is falling apart by war and horrors untold. With a King falling down a path of no return, an hero trying to save the people, and a human girl thrown into the mix its a dramatic and action packed story. The characters learn many hardships and struggle to over come their own dark desires.
BorderControl: Vilka is a young naga with a burning curiosity towards the human kind as she sets to live among them!
BoredomandCoffee: Have you ever had a day that just made you think, "What the hell just happened?" Well, I do. All the time. Let me tell you all about it. A comic about quirky and humorous things that have happened to yours truly. And other random stuff. Based on real-life experiences, all of which were caused by boredom, coffee, both, or lack thereof. :) Note: occasional swearing, some snark, and references galore. I promise that my drawing skills will improve as I update!
BorrowPlace: Borrow Place is loosely based on my life, day by day. I work in a Borrow Place aka library. Books! eBooks! Facebook! If people want bowling balls, by god, let them borrow bowling balls. Customer service and library humor.
BotAndbird: Bot awakens from his entombment after a decade of falling ash, only to realize that Earth has been decimated from atomic bombs leaving no survivors...Except for a bird that seems to be following him. Bot starts his humorous adventure of exploration and comical follies.
Bouquet: A simple, straightforward story about Darrel, a schoolboy, who has fallen in love with a popular deviant. [BL] EXTRA - Breakfast set: Darrel's best friend feels lonely, but will that feeling last? [COMPLETE]
BowsersAdventures: Just your average Mario comic, except not really. because it's about Bowser and his minions.
BoyorGirl: NUZLOCKE Rules: 1- If a Pokemon faints, it is Dead, box it. 2- Catch only the first Pokemon encountered per Route, if failed, two more tries are given. 2a- Bodies of water count as the Route/Town they reside in. 2b- Duplicate Pokemon are to be disregarded. 2c- Shiny Pokemon are allowed. 2d- Legendries are allowed to be caught, but must be boxed. 3- Nickname all Pokemon.
BoysLikeYou: When you're an incubus going through high school, you're gonna have a bad rep as being the "town's whore" while walking through these hallways. Harvey doesn't mind it though. Just another daily day for this 18-year old. After one wrong night of studying with his friend Joesph, he has to gain his friendship and his trust back... and possibly aim for a little bit more. Its a oneshot thing so its only a few pages long Hope you'll like it~ Contains: -BL/Yaoi Reads from right to left!!
BoysXSchool: Himeko the 16 years old girl. Her first day in a new school, where the principal is his step-father. Her parent newly married, and his step-father enter to his school to help her mother's money problem. But Takamura didn't said this is a boy school. She had no choise and she is the new student in the school, where 're many pervert and who knows what kind of boy 'll surround her. And to top it all the boys want to earn her hearts. BrainCramps: Various failed comics projects, random shots, pin-ups, fanarts and other things that may or may not fit into the "real" comics projects of scatterbrained cartoonist know as Xailenrath.
BrandRod: Brand Röd © Georgette Translations: Chiara Caruso YAOI- BL Comic Brand Röd (“Flame Red” in Swedish) is the character of a fairy tale, a cruel fairy tale that tells about how from hatred arises only more hatred; but sometimes fiction and reality are not so far apart. BreachofAgency: Panacea has the gift of healing, which makes her a target for both sides of a civil war. The Minister, leader of the Agency, is determined to have her cure his fatal illness and prolong his life. Forever. But the Gunman and his accomplices want her dead. All Panacea wants is to find her own destiny. When she and her bodyguard, Aegis, stumble upon Traver, who takes them in after they narrowly escape a brush with death, Panacea believes she may have found a real home. But the Agency has eyes everywhere, the Gunman is always waiting in the shadows, and Panacea can never be sure who her allies are.
BreakfastonaCliff: A boy named Cinna goes to a new school. See what happens! Updates: Fridays Or any other time ending with "day."
Breaks: It’s a love story… but a bit broken. Features strong language and themes.
BrieflyMogwyle: What would Romeo & Juliet be like if Juliet had wanted nothing to do with Romeo? And also Romeo had a weird mole-dog who followed him around? And actually the story isn't anything like Romeo & Juliet besides focusing on the love life of a pathetic boy? Briefly, Mogwyle!! is the story of screenwriter Edgar Cliffton and his sidekick, Mogwyle, as he tries to discover the secrets to a successful love life while juggling work for a rich, moon-headed drama queen. Pretty typical stuff, really.
BrokenDreams: I wanted to draw a short comic and had no idea for a plot. It was for a contest and it was on such short demand that I didn't really have time to come up with anything, so a good friend of mine gave me a scenario she wrote a few months back. She was delighted with the finished results and says she could not have done any better, which made me feel really special. I hope you can also enjoy it and, maybe, even cry.
BrokenInside: In the peaceful Kingdom of Aengus, The Good King reigns. But that peace is maintained only by his Assassins ...can we still call it a good king ? Updates on sunday.
BrokenSilence: Please read: Right to Left Genre: Fantasy, Romance, (crappy) Action, Tragedy, One-shot/Short story. *Please be aware of sudden art improvement, blood/gore(?), violence, coarse language, fail love, horrible grammer and perhaps a box of tissues??* ---------------------------- In the Kingdom of Bellcoast, a tale about a young man who happens to come across the rumored "Silent Princess." Burn: Spunky young college student Darryn Gainnes has just turned 20, and decided to tone his wild ways down a bit. All he needs in life are his two best friends, their band, his books, and his music. He thinks nothing of it when he literally bumps into a pretty (and gloomy) High-School-boy at the park. But soon, Darryn finds himself swept up in a world he had never even known existed, a world of intrigues and violence and magic! And of course what is sweeping both boys off their feet is their budding romance... and so many incredible obstacles thrown in their way. Where will it all lead? Who is on their side... and who will be left standing? .:. 3rd place in the "Drama" category of the 2013 Smackie Awards! ^_^ WARNINGS: Occasional violence, "bad" language. BL: This is a Boys' Love/Yaoi comic! If you don't like those, don't read this one! DIRECTION: This comic reads right to left, for no other reason than that I like it that way. BurningDeparted: A complete revamp of Broken Hearts are Healed. I renamed it and redrew it. Due to my patience I have slowly started to complete the story. So there will be weekly updates (if not weekly then every other week) This series is a horror mystery with a LOT of gore. Demi is a spirit hunter...or rather...Paranormal investigator who often gets false leads. She wanted so very badly to get a REAL investigation with REAL spirits...unfortunately...she gets her wish. Evil spirits have started to emerge and have started stealing the hearts of the ones who responsible for their deaths. They aren't acting on their own.

CARDS: A comic series involving CARDS (CRIME AGENCY and RESIDENCE of DEFENSE AND SUPERNATURAL) Story is written by Kid_Hendricks and Art is done by chokolatte

CLBOY: I am a cheerleader and I do not ever fall in love with a rabbit! My heart beats for a squirrel and not for a fox! ............................................. Io sono una cheerleader e non mi innamorerò mai di un coniglio! Il mio cuore batte per uno scoiattolo e non per una volpe!
CONCHORD: A scifi/action/adventure webcomic about space pirates, freedom and ROBOT ARMS!!!! ... Please check us out! :D
CURSEYOU: a story about two idiots (and magic). ps.: story will include a bit of romance here and there. WARNING: lots and lots of swear words !!!
CadencesPrayer: A 15 page side-story prequel one-shot of "Crimson Shadows" about how Cadence Mizukage met Aaron Murasaki a year before. Originally this one-shot was to be submitted to the DREAM SDI#2, but I didn't get it done in time. I have submitted it to the 4th anniversary edition of the online version, however. I plan have this comic printed with EXTRA manga pages to make the story longer (as this is a condensed version of the story I had in my head to fit in a 15 page limit) and other neat little extras, so wait for announcements concerning that!
CafeAmargo: Domingo Ramirez has lost everything; his family, his job and happiness. The only thing he still has left is bills to pay. Even though his future seems worse than death itself, he decides to keep strong and search for his "light of hope" that appears even in the darkest and most difficult situations, but, the shape of that light is not what he was expecting... Set in the year 1939 in a country of South America. Cómic en Español: http://cafeamargo.subcultura.es/
CafeSuada: Down by the riverside there is a quaint little teahouse run by our heroine, Geraldine, who's only desire is to spread her love of the golden beverage - But what's going to happen to her business when a new coffee house springs up right next door?! And what is the meaning of Cafe Suada? Guess you'd better read and find out, huh?
CalicosKey: A scruffy outside cat has grown an onlooking affection for an indoor cat. It is a BL (nothing to severe for like... 100 pages) Will be updated on Fridays (and a few random days in between) I am putting on the mature content only because there will be and I don't want to have anyone unaware when it comes. I am doing edits on the first pages so if there are inconsistencies I apologize)
CallumFury: Do you really kill if the beast in side you does the killing? Callum Fury fights himself in his endless struggle to save everyone he meets.
Cambion: Beware the Cambion. The demon longs for the taste of newborn flesh and has called away many a fair maiden to beget them with child just for a taste of it. Be cautious of his sweet words and promises. A Cambion can never defy it's nature. Warnings: Will contain MxM MxF and FxF(possibly) Also graphic blood/violence.
Camisado: Kitty Papillon is given the opportunity of a lifetime when she is hired as an assistant to the preeminent zoologist Otto Camisado. He is trying to compile the world's most comprehensive creature encyclopedia, and he and his team are going to travel the world documenting various creatures.
CanNeverGiveUp: This is a two-page manga that I created for a contest. It's read from right to left. The theme being "my art can change the world." I'd love to see what you all think. It's only two pages so it won't take you long. So how about it~?
CaningMom: A sexy middle aged BBW mom makes an improbable schoolgirl when she infiltrates St Tristan's notorious girls school to expose sluttish sixth formers and lesbian teachers. When she's eventually found out, she is subjected to a humiliating and brutal caning across her huge, fat buttocks.
Canis: Hunter and wolf story. Magic involved. idk sort of a Beauty and the Beast???? [BL] yo whatevs I'll put up a proper summary later ugh
Canman: Canman Comic – the story of a Dark Dog superhero. The story begins with Matt and his trusty sidekick, Darky the dog, who, on an expedition to the Amazon rainforest, crash their helicopter and find themselves in the abandoned depths of the jungle. There, an incredible plot unfolds as our hero taps into the powerful energy of Dark Dog set free by a lightning bolt from outer space during a tropical storm. An unbelievable transformation takes place right before our eyes: Matt and Darky turn into Canman, the world´s most energetic superhero! Canman Comic follows Matt and Darky´s exciting adventures, as bit by bit, they discover Canman´s skills and powers, such as supersonic speed, super strength, super smell, super hearing, super jump and last, but not least, immunity. With each fight against Dr. Drowsiness and Dr. Exhaustion, two terrible villains, who seek to suck the energy out of the vibrant Dark Dog City, Canman grows into his character as a superhero. A new issue of the Canman comic is released every Monday at http://www.canman-comic.com.
CannabanWaronMagicalMarijuana: An anime-style webcomic about college kids who get magic powers from smoking marijuana.
CantLearn: William has just begun living with his mother, and welcomes the start at his new school as a needed diversion. There he runs into the unexpected. Love confessions, angry brothers, and violent strangers. Curiosity drives William to assist an impulsive peer, but he’ll need more than that to help carry him through every punch and bruise. In an effort to define love William soon finds it’s not something so easily labeled. With such a wild and crazy emotion, how could he ever hope to learn its mysterious ways? OOps forgot to mention its BL XD slow progress, and unsexy. Updates: Aiming for Thursdays
Caprice: Fantastical! Gay! Kinda Victorian? Demons! Angst! Humor! Subverted tropes! Plot twists! "hot guy romance all up in this thing come read!" In an attempt to soothe internal turmoil and advance her own political influence, Alexis invites members of the Adhir family, Nuraj and son Altaire to negotiate a trade and alliance between their two city-towns. They however, come with their own agenda in mind. ~~ will contain mature content & be marked as +18 once necessary -- I suck at writing summaries help Altaire & all those related to him belong to prax/meibatsu @ meibatsu.deviantart.com
CaptiveSoul: A BL Pirate manga! :P Sai works on the ship "The Liberty", he was taken in at a young age after his town was burned down and he lost his family. The event was traumatizing and Sai lost his ability to speak. He has sworn to hunt down the pirates that destroyed his home and bring them to justice(however that seems a long ways away) However, recently the captain of the ship, Kuragi, has taken an interest in Sai! Will Kuragi's advances distract Sai from his goal to avenge his family? A stormy relationship ahead! Will update every Thursdays :D
CaramelKissu: A 21 year old by the name of Misaomi tries to maintain his job as the head of shoujo branch for the U.B.M company. A company for manga publishing. One day, after recovering from a mentally tragic event, he is attacked by a robber on his way to work. An annoying robber, who doesn't quite seem like a robber. More like a pervert. In the middle of being attacked by the 'robber', they both get themselves into a pinch. Will this event spark a friendship.....or something worse? Comments appreciated~ (Ф∀Ф)
CaravanaTaleofGodsandMen: In a world of magic, mystery, and mayhem a sickly child and her protectors will attempt to transverse great deserts and expansive grasslands to reach the sea, and a hope for a cure. A witch, her sole purpose to protect the girl. A scarred man, beholden to the child who holds his stolen name. With each step they're drawn further into a mystery that will unravel truths about the lands in which they live. What will this world hold for them? Only time will tell.
Carciphona: In an era where magic is forbidden, a sorceress struggles to restore her once peaceful life.
CardboardAngel: Cardboard Angel is a web comic I created from 2008 to 2013 and posted on Strawberry Comics. It revolves around a girl named Mayuko who is called upon by a ghost named Yuuji to help him pass over into the afterlife, and is filled with drama, comedy, and an extra helping of shoujo manga bubbles! I've decided to repost CA in its entirety here for fun, and to also have it on a more reliable server (the server for Strawberry Comics sometimes goes down for days at a time). Not only will the entire comic be posted here, I will also be adding new content--new art, potential bonus stories, things I didn't have time for during the original run--so returning readers won't just be getting the same old stuff. I hope you all enjoy Cardboard Angel: Extended Edition! Updates will be Monday through Friday!
CarnivalSpirit: A normal day of tiresome work at College turns into a nightmare in the hands of a festive intruder.
CaseUntitled: Short stories about incidents that have happened to me. It might develop into something more but for now I am just planning on illustration two scenarios that have happened recently.
Castillo: Clyde Castillo is a 437 year old Incubus who just happened to find an abandoned 'human' child when he was 416. As the girl grew older, the demon began to learn new things about her. Like her ability to talk to the dead, and her strange habits of blood lust. Through out their lives together, Clyde had begun to suspect that she was a demon just as he was, so they packed up their bags, and headed to America to meet his "family". Upon their arrival, the succubus within Jay is woken from it's rest, and she finally realizes her inner potential, and who she is. Throughout the course of their lives, so many stories unfold involving the love of demons, and the reincarnation of the seven sins. And it's up to Jay and her new found family to save the bridge connecting the dream world, Hell, and the world of the living before time runs out.
Cataclysm: Set on the last remaining hospitable island on a frozen world, a covert faction known as Militia attempts to overthrow a utopian civilization and their benevolent rulers, The Council.
CatchaSpell: Group of wizard friends has planned to gather together at weekend to have fun. It all is in danger to get ruin because of ''joke'' of infamous student.
CatcherintheY: A comic based loosely on the story of my (on-going) playthrough of Pokemon Y. Lots of rewriting and some character-replacement. I'm following a set of somewhat Nuzlocke-like rules, only much more gentle since I don't want to inadvertently limit myself from using the newer Pokemon. If you're a purist when it comes to Pokemon comics, this won't be for you. I have some ideas for altering the story in a rather unconventional way.
Catnip: Ikita is a young and impressionable noble, who has been bound to a young lady by arranged marraige. Felix is his hired bodyguard; a quick witted and reliable one at that - but who has more to his past than he would like to reveal. As Felix follows Ikita as his bodyguard, they start to have mixed feelings about their positions, and where the future may lead... Based in an 19th centrury-esque alternate history, this tale consists of friendship, compassion, love and regret.
CatohoopHeroes: When his dying grandfather gave him a miniature trebuchet, Trevor was disappointed. Little did he know it would lead him and his brother to become CATOHOOP HEROES. The comic equivalent of a failed 90's kids show meant to sell toys, Catohoop Heroes is written by Joanna and illustrated by Ryan. Features fantasy, adventure, family dysfunction, aardvark wizards, and a mentally-challenged tiger-beast!
CatsandDragons: A story about two magical neko sisters and their pet dragons that work as PIs for many strange clients.
CaveCruciatum: 【1271, Turkey】 Zarif finds his life turned inside-out by an unexpected event: the crusader in his bedroom. 《UPDATES EVERY SATURADY @ 3PM (GMT+1)》
CelestialBluevol1preview: "Celestial Blue" is a classic style magical girl manga that attempts to bend formula, subtracting tropes and adding others, and dealing head-on with problems young people face, making for a unique reading experience. Please enjoy this online preview of volume 1
Celflux: One day six complete strangers, one from each of the six realms of the planet New Genesia, awakens to find themselves in a remote scientific laboratory, without any memory of how they got there, or what might have happened to them. They must then begin a journey of discovery to find the answers to the mystery that brought them all together. The answers come at the cost of facing great peril and suffering great loss. When they do find the answers they seek, they are brought to the place where they must decide weather or not they are willing to make the ultimate sacrifice. A sacrifice that may be the only thing that will save their world from total destruction.
CercanaLejania: Done for the indie comic magazine Region Cu4tro at the year 2010. A small story about a boy who fell in love with a star.
Cerintha: The Empire is dying and barbarians are on the move. As the age of darkness seems imminent and inevitable, the people of this transitional world move to protect their interests.
ChaTheLifeofYamagataChiyoko: Chiyoko Yamagata is a weird girl and when she starts her new day at a weird school is the day everything gets....even more weird.
ChainLink: Originally intended as a short story, it has been expanded due to encouragement from fans and my family. Leen is a spunky girl who has attracted the attention of a boy, Glen. Since only women are allowed on Leen's home planet for most of the year, Glen puts on a dress and calls himself "Glendora" so he can be close to the girl he loves. How long will his true identity be a secret? Before I forget, this comic reads from left to right, to conform to the English language. Enjoy.

ChamberoftheSoul: There are some things which humans were never meant to tamper with. Whether you believe in a god or not certain knowledge need stay forbidden. The human soul is one such area of study which should remain amongst the speculation of theologians and not enter the realm of the scientists. A certain Braxton Sinclair was daring enough to try to blur the lines between the two. And so begins his adventure... Updates Tuesdays and Thursdays
ChampionofChampions: COC: Requested Matches and Round 2 are down until the month of August. Round 1 and Round 3 are available to read. WARNING: This comic has blood and gore. Viewer discretion is advised! Its like the Mortal Kombat of Sprite Tournaments! If you like over the top, nonsensical action and glorious potrayals of your favorite characters, then this comic is for you! This webcomic puts you, the reader, in a tournament called: CHAMPION OF CHAMPIONS! It's not your average sprite fighting tournament! 18 characters are chosen at random and you get to decide who wins and who loses. All characters were picked at RANDOM meaning that you will get to witness fights that you have never seen before! Sonic the Hedgehog vs Ghost Rider! Naruto vs Nightcrawler! Superman vs Thor! Vegeta vs Ken! Kirby vs Super Buu! Jin Kazama vs Ryu! The list goes on and on! Voting is limited to once per day. Also, this comic has major focus on action. DISCLAIMER: ALL SPRITES BELONG TO THEIR RESPECTIVE OWNERS, I TAKE OWNERSHIP FOR NOTHING! I'M ONLY MAKING THIS COMIC FOR FUN!

CheneysGotaGun: Cheney's back! Ever wonder what Dick Cheney is doing in his secure undisclosed location? The Hunting �accident� was only the beginning. Dick Cheney has now found his true calling. This is a graphic novel I did a few years ago and have decided to give it a rerun.
CherryChase: ...or, My best friend's wedding: Paul and Sherry have been best friends and working for the same company for 5 years. ChildSeven: One comic, four stories. Child Seven: The seventh child of every human generation has been gifted with magic. The Seventh Children are hunted, scorned, and feared. Our story follows Walker, a Seventh Child, as he makes his way to Karrund, the only country that will let him live in peace. But will his world let him? Reality One: ...is about Echowise, the mimic and the struggling superhero Reality Two: Soon to be unveiled. Reality Three: Soon to be unveiled.
ChildrenoftheNight: Vampires are at the brink of extinction ruled with a heavy hand by the Hunters, an order of vampire slayers that has existed since the beginning of mankind. The centuries-old law is very clear; a vampire can only feed off criminals whose names are on the lists provided by the Hunters. Any other interaction with humans means punishment and even execution if they are harmed. But when an unlikely friendship between a human girl and a vampire starts to grow into something much deeper, can these laws be obeyed? CotN is a romance webcomic set in the Victorian Era, depicting forbidden love amidst a clash between vampires and the Hunters, an order of vampire slayers. :It updates every Monday:
ChildrenoftheSwells: After a young captain, Lyle, is washed ashore on a strange island he is faced the reality of his situation. He is stranded there, seemingly indefinitely with some very strange companions. Updates weekly on Wednesday
ChimiMouryou: Near the top of one of Japan's many mountains away from all the human villages, there is a forest inhabited by youkai who are constantly learning how to deal with each other. Basically, "The Daily Lives of Crazy Youkai" This comic is a bunch of random short stories and not one continuous one. Everything is acted out in pantomime AKA there are no written words. Chimi mouryou can be roughly translated as "evil monsters in the mountains and rivers". The legend of it keeps the forest safe from humans. I am still researching more about the Edo period and youkai, so I apologize for unintentional inaccuracies. For now, the updates for this comic are random. I apologize!
Chipp20NowWithEXPLOSIONS: A remake of a comic I did when I was 10 years old. Recently I had a dream that I was redoing this comic, so I decided to do it in real life. Updates Thursdays.
ChippSquad: Done for Tokyopop Germany's just-for-fun "12h Shounen Manga" challenge! This is the final, polished version in English.
ChivalryRemastered: Three years ago, Crystal Rose was a glorious city. A city that had became a worldwide hot spot where everyone enjoyed their stay and lived without a care in the world. That is until the "White Wing Demon" incident that occurred in this city. Thousands had died in the incident and the city was almost in ruins. And to make matters worst, crime lords have now taken over the city and crime has risen to where murder and rape is an everyday occurrence in this once beautiful city. Now the government has declared the city to be closed off from the world, leaving the people who are trapped in there without any hope of escape. Crystal Rose has now become a living hell. But there is still hope. One man has returned to the city after three years in order to gather a team of like-minded individuals to take back the city and restore it to it's former glory. This shall be a fight for the sake of it's future...and also redemption for one's sin.
ChocolatewithPepper: The story takes place in the 1920s in a lovely small town called Ventura, in Brazil. Its economic growth depends on a local chocolate factory called Bombom, which is very famous for its chocolate. Ana Francisca is a beautiful young girl, but she is from a poor family. She hides her beauty with big glasses, old hairstyle, and outdated clothing. She lost her parents not too long ago and moved to Ventura to live with her other family members. In that family, there are her Grandma Carmen, Uncle Margarido, Cousins Marcia and Timothy, and Dalia, who was accepted into the family. Ana helps out at home until she is accepted a job to work as a janitor at the Chocolate Factory after school. There she meets Ludovico, the factory owner who pretends to be one of the workers at the factory. Ludovico returns to Ventura to investigate his greedy sister Jezebel, who lives like a queen after taking over the factory. While Ana's in Ventura, she falls in love with Danilo, the town's flirt who has dated almost every girl in town. However, his main love interest is the beautiful girl, Olga. Although he says he never fall in love, will that possibly change after meeting Ana Francisca?
Choices: A young girl wakes up in a forest and has some run ins. With who? The Creepypastas of course! Join her in an adventure of danger and pain.
ChristmaswithGatamigo: Originally "Christmas With Gatamigo" Have you ever seen a holiday special on tv? One that was filled with snappy music, handsome actors, and snazzy special effects? ClaraBraverman: Clara Braverman is an old woman, telling her story to a young reporter. This is her life from 1906 to 1911. This is historical fiction.
Clash: A 4-Panel webcomic of cute kids doing cute things! ...And some un-cute things.
ClawsandFire: In a fantasy world with magical creatures Huxley a boy who is only half human tends to be shunned and ridiculed by all who look at him. One day while working as a crew mate on a cargo ship back to his home island he is forced into the task of taking care of a so called demonic creature locked in a cage and told "No matter what you must give it no sympathy". a fantasy BL story with some adult themes which include nudity, bad words and adult situations updates on fridays!!
ClaymoreZeldasStory: Updates are currently weekly. Check the comic news for any delays or changes in updating. *WARNING: Contains blood and gore. May not be appropriate for everyone.* A Legend of Zelda (game) and Claymore (anime/manga) crossover fan comic. Hyrule is a land infested by human-eating monsters called Yoma. Yoma are incredibly powerful creatures able to disguise themselves as humans. In retaliation, a group called the Organization have created warriors that are part human and part Yoma. They are able to sense Yoma even if they are disguised as humans. Characterized by silver eyes, pale hair, and the large sword they carry, normal humans have given them the name Claymores. The story follows a Claymore named Zelda. What starts off as a routine Yoma hunt spirals out of control as she has a run in with a powerful type of Yoma known as an Awakened Being. After a fateful meeting with a certain person, Zelda is drawn into a fight far larger than what she could have imagined...
CleanCure: -A few hundred years into the future, life has changed, but remained relatively the same from a social standpoint. Various government plans to deal with the changing global climate ended in many successes, but many more failures. As a result, certain mutations began to appear in humans as well as animals, and though most were bred out, some remain to the present. -Enter Ezra and Percy; two young men, cat-boys in fact, whom are facing a tough time not only surviving day to day, but making their dreams a reality. After losing their current job, they are offered a new one by a seemingly normal, but secretive man with a lot of money. Their new boss employs them as maids, frilly dresses and all, and makes them clean his and the mansions of others. It quickly becomes apparent that their boss is more interested in the ever mutating rat-like creatures which are making their homes in the dirty world of military cover-ups and powerful family connections. When these two get caught up in the lies and secrecy of their new occupation, will they be able to escape? And what is the connection between mutations and the incident 20 years ago?
ClearSkies: Clear Skies is an adventure fantasy comic that follows the story of four races and the four young leaders that represent them, as well as their friends, family, and those no longer living. main site clearskiescomic.com
ClockworkAtrium: In a misguided attempt to develop their full potential for success, students at a German university are forced to participate in a campus chess "game" in which they are the pieces and the captures could consist of murder. Updates Sundays.

ColdBlooded: It's one of the hottest summers on record in Satellite Falls, so why are people freezing to death? Volatile cop Carl Weatherton takes it upon himself to track down a killer who will redefine the term "cold-blooded". Taking place five years before the events of "The Kwiddex Protocol", we're treated to some clues as to the mystery around Jerry Binder and the White Rose!
ColdMindHOOKED: "Though my soul may set in darkness, it will rise in perfect light. I have loved the stars too fondly to be fearful of the night." ~Sarah Williams A little side project of mine, a small comic I am working on which relaxes me quite a lot. Stay tuned to figure out about Sasa's past and about the beginning of his comedown. More about my vampire characters on loeeshian.deviantart.com
ColeandtheDragon: A book I made for my creative writing class about Cole and the Dragon of course. This is a children's story but it's meant for general audiences. My High school class enjoyed it.
CollabHospital: A hospital drama as a collab comic! Since the story takes place in a hospital, there is bound to be blood and wounds so I checked the "Mature content" box as something not suitable for minors. Artist of any style and skill can enter! If you like all those television hospital series then wait no longer! Even if you haven't watched those series, join to create a gripping and exciting story!
ColorBlind: Five 13-year olds discover a world that makes theirs seem grey in comparison in a closet at their school. It is a world of magic, and adventure, and a war that the kids might have gotten sucked into accidentally. Main Site: http://colorblindcomic.com/ Updates are Mondays and Fridays.
ColorsinTheNight: Monty and his family live in a secluded cove, which rests deep within the heart of the domain of a vengeful smoke named Monochrome. Both have lived in denial of the other's existence. Once their paths crossed, their lives changed forever. Originally supposed to be called Colors, but the name was taken. Updates on the Even Days
Colourblind: This is a short little fairytale about a boy who loves colours, but is colourblind.
ComedownMachine: Her name is Tonomi Hiraoka. She’s been dating an unsuccessful musician for about four years. However she finds out that he’s been cheating on her, and on top of that he blames it on her being “boring”. She decides to do something bold to show him just how boring she could get. So Tonomi meets a perfect stranger in the city. A stranger she calls “Irony.” ----------- Story by Amapora Art by Tosuto JAPANESE READING ORDER: RIGHT TO LEFT
Comewithme: Draco Malfoy has been strangely and suspiciously tired and stressed lately. This is obviously not overlooked by Harry Potter. HARRY POTTER SHORT FAN COMIC alternate ending. Taken place in sixth year. Pairing: Drarry <<<<< Read from RIGHT TO LEFT <<<<< Disclaimer: I do not own the Harry Potter series
ComicsByMarcos: This comic is a comic inside a comic. A comic made by my character Marcos from irl * ilu.
Comoestrelas: Portuguese version~ Personal project, also entered in a local contest. c: Special thanks to Kally, precious friend who helped me with UaL (http://ual.smackjeeves.com/)! I learned so much with her, and this probably wouldn't be possible without her! Thank you so much!
ComplicatedStory: So this is my first comic ever and I will be looking forward in trying this! I've been wanting to do this for a long time but have not gotten my lazy ass to do it. But now finally have I found the time and energy to start it! I don't know how often this will be uploaded but I will really try to not be too absent since this is something I really want to do! This story is based on one of my closest friends and mine roleplay. If you don't like BL(Boys love) you should not read this comic! Just a heads up! This comic is about Lei and Rain. They meet at a party and even though they find themselves in a hard situation they end up falling for eachother. The story is about them and how they will try to find a way to be together without any difficulties which will turn out to be way harder than they both thought. Concord: Sammy Baxa is your typical, ordinary girl. But, of course, that all changes when she dies. Sammy is somehow sent to a faraway land, known as Theia. Soon after her arrival, she learns that she is to participate in a competition held by the playful God of Theia if she wants to be able to go home. Well, if she's going to be in a fantasy place like Theia, she may as well make the best of it! It's your typical land of magical things. There are (lazy as shit) elves, (murderous) mermaids, (lovecraftian) fairies, (sentient) curses galore, and, of course, tragic backstories. --- Full summaries are here(!): http://concord.smackjeeves.com/summaries/ --- Act 1/13 Contains swearing, supernatural stuff, gore and bad drawings.
ConcreteAndLobsters: Crazy things come out of this girl's mouth. Seriously. Clair might need help. Follow Concrete & Lobsters ;) at www.KMTowne.tumblr.com This comic is based off the content of Clairsaid.tumblr.com Updates every Monday.
ConfectioneryComic: A comic about tiny cakes, unrequited crushes, and sunscreen. (Potentially NSFW, updates Thursdays)
Conquest: UPDATING FRIDAYS AGAIN FOR A WHILE! In an unfortunate land, calamity has struck. A cruel and heartless military genius, hellbent on conquering the world, has laid siege upon the helpless innocents living within its walls. Together with both army and a talented general, they have taken over the entire region in a manner of weeks, before any even saw them coming. However, when the conquering force takes refuge in a captured castle to rest and resupply, the cross-dressing Lord Arctis seems to lose interest in world conquest altogether, setting his sights instead on an even juicier prize... Rated mature for later. Five chapters, BL. First chapter is my 2012 "noble failure" 24 hour comic.
Consectari: " I don't care to know what I am, I want to know what I can do. " The United States, New York and Brooklyn, just not as we've seen them before. Hidden from the public eye, paranormal and supernatural incidents take place - sometimes with severe consequences. Six people, yet unknown to eachother and who all share similar abilities get mixed up in a journey of their lives. Together they'll have to uncover the myths and explore the realms in order to get answers and explanations for the current happenings - as well as their own existence. ------- Even though the story takes place in our reality as well as in real places and cities, individuals and brands are fictional.
ConsoleWars: The Gaming world is certainly not a settled one. Fanboys and Fangirls of various gaming companies argue and debate, while the competition to release the next big game continues. Follow the personified companies in the wacky and geeky Webcomic : 'Console wars'! I am, in no way, affiliated with any of the companies or games that may appear in the comic. Additionally, I do not own or claim to own any of these companies or their Logo's and Names.
Continue: Cait is bored; she'd rather play video games instead of looking for a job and even then she's played them all and knows EVERYTHING! One day, a mysterious video game arrives and somehow Cait is transported into a magical world known as Adamah and is charged by its guardian/goddess to "stop those who'd destroy the world"! What could possibly go wrong?? ...let's not answer that, shall we? * * * * UPDATES SATURDAYS AND READS THE WESTERN WAY (I.E. LEFT TO RIGHT). WARNING THIS COMIC CONTAINS UNFUNNY HUMOUR, SKETCH DRAWINGS, BAD HANDWRITING (I'M SORRY IF YOU CAN'T READ IT!!) AND ATTEMPTS TO REFERENCE CLICHE RPG VIDEO GAMES/A NOT CREATIVE PLOT. ConventionalWisdom: Ever wondered what goes on inside an anime convention, but are too afraid go anywhere near one yourself? Well, wonder no more! Corona: Tari Vul is a Vultian mech living happily in the core of the planet with her tentacled friend, Hannah, and the supposed Goddess of planet Vul. Sedgwick Wolke is an Mnemian ecologist who's been offered a job investigating a strange planet that crates it's own light.
CorporateTrash: Corporate trash is a story about a young girl, Yona, who struggles to find normality in life after being set free from her life as a test subject. All set in the wasteland of Londons secret metropolis, in the coming of the second moon, Yona, alongside her absentee friend, Coco, is now on a quest to find herself in a new life. Unbeknownst to her, Her future has already been decided and she must fulfil this or face a fate worse then death.
CosPlayBoy: The CosPlayBoy manga is about a group of friends establishing a cosplay team with the big ambitions of winning a cosplay competition at an animecon. Actually the whole story is based on true characters and events, so it's kinda like our memories as a cosplay team in a manga form, and just like the cosplaying itself it is all about fun. :D
CosmicDash: Follow the adventures of the crew of the Lucky Strike, a cargo-ship exploring a shifting galactic landscape.
CosplayCrush: Sean, a self-professed cool guy and lord of all things un-nerdy, finds himself falling head over heels for a cosplayer.
Cottontail: Bunny girl ponders the meaning of life and punches people.
CoulditbeFate: A word of warning: it is completed however I lost interest in the story long ago so it is not as good as I had hoped it to be, it is rushed. However, please feel free to continue reading. 4 Friends. 2 Enemies. 1 War. Could it be Fate? Jaden and Marcus are no normal humans, they have the same mark that holds a special power that can bring peace to the Saints and Devourers. But how is this power released? And what else will these two teens come across? Boy Love. No Yaoi, just cute fluff~ :) Much better and neater artwork in more recent and later pages.
CountDorkula: Loser vampire shenanigans, or an excuse for me to draw all the crazy shit I want. Contains swearing, drug use, blasphemy, weird panel experimentation, dancing zombies, etc.
CountdowntoZeroHour: The final years of the Classic Mega Man series revealed. Wily and Light both strive to give life to their greatest creations.
Cover: This is a Boys Love comic (^_^)b (I will eventually change this to mature, but not quite yet <3 ) Jakob moves away from home and because of housing shortage ends up sharing an appartment with Daichi. He seems a little strange, only wears hooded shirts and won't show his face without it. But Jakob still has a really good feeling about it. The same can't be said for Daichi who is struggling with the demons of his schooltime bullies yet again come to torture him. He would like nothing more than to be left alone. But with Jakob added to the mix, that's not going to happen. Updates every Wednesday! This comic takes place in a fictive city in Sweden. Since it is originally written in swedish, some of the soundeffects and so on will still be in that language. But fear not, there will be translations in the author comments when needed (^_^)
CoverUpKisscompleted: The King of Brasus has recently passed away. The Queen, Aelis, needs a new husband and turns to her rather flamboyant childhood friend as a solution... but he's got something else in mind. CraftySmith: "The names Smith, Anthony Smith and you sir just saw the extent of my patiences!" Follow the crazy adventures of Anthony Smith, an oddball man of crafting and magic.
Cramberries: Lucinda is just a normal girl who lives with her roommate in an apartment... until her childhood friend came back to visit here. Now, she has been cursed with a demonic eye and almost everyone seems to be after her. Could it be her eye that everyone is after or is it there something more to it? Follow Lucinda and her friends as they uncover dark secrets and traverse their way along a perilous journey filled with all manners of action, humour, evil and good, love and stupidity. Updates Monday, Wednesday, and Friday @ 13(EST) (Might not always update on time) KitKatMuffin: Artist and Creator Seranatis: Editor and Assistant NOTE: The Editor sometimes post some random art and leaves messages when I'm not available on the website; regardless, they are NOT canon.
CrazyPerfect: Kyle works for a video game store. He's the kind of guy that gives up on things too easily. It's a trait that makes him easily unnoticeable and unfriendly. Never before has he chased after anything. Until he met Joe. (Updates Sunday)
CreatorsArmor: A young man, named Howey Moses Prince, is led by the Creator to free the kingdom from the evil grip that has controlled it for so many years, and restore the kingdom to a Creator led rule. Thus fulfilling the prophesy of the Creator's Hero. The adventures, lessons and trials Howey has as the Creator leads him through this task becomes the story of Creator's Armor. VOLUME ONE Howey Prince doesn't believe this prophesied hero will ever come, but then when his village is attacked by the High Seer Malfance he learns that King Zorru now believes he's the hero! Meeting new friends from the Refuge Army Howey sets out to escape the High Seer....but along the way will he follow the Creator's leading or his own?
CrimsonWings: Devon Rider was just another normal kid with evolving problems in a quickly changing world. The government had fallen and shape-shifting hybrids called Alphas were stationed everywhere, changing everyday life and bringing back physical punishment. However, Devon has a hard time adapting to the New Order and before he knew what happened, he found himself in even more trouble then he ever could have imagined. Turning into a mutant himself, he finds himself with more responsibility than he could ever dream to handle. And to make things worse, the New Order has plans of wiping the human race off the face of the earth. Can Devon and his friends even survive the next year of the rapidly changing world? I'd rate this story as 14+ due to language, realistic and fictional violence, and gore. This story is told by the point of view of a teenage boy, and it contains war and several violent sci-fy elements. This comic reads left to right and will be updated on MONDAY(for now) This story is mainly an experimental trial for me and will mostly be for practice. So the art and the storyline will not be my best or stylistically consistent but will hopefully evolve as I improve!
CrocodileTears: Violence? Check. Bad language? Check. Twisted sense of humour? Check. Lots of booze? Check. Busty ladies and hot guys? Check. Crazy reptilians? Check. Surprise buttsex? Check. ... on second thought, we'll keep the booze. But you can have all the rest ;)
CrookedKings: Rohan realizes her savings are coming to an end, and she only knows one way to get more money. A pirate's life for her, ohoy. Meanwhile there's a lot going on in the kingdom. Crossbones: When traveling with the royal family of Mercia, an ambush strikes and attacks the royal airship. As his duty to his country, airship mechanic Troy McKelski must venture through battle and escort the prince to safety.
CrowandCat: Not your typical yaoi/BL story. A very dark and almost tragic story of a man dealing with depression and a number of other anxiety disorders in a world far from home. He has been admiring his friend from afar for much too long now. Bold moves can lead to regret or success. Follow the story of four men living in a war. That was a really cheesey description I'm sorry. Hello my name is Felix, read my story Updates every Sunday or more, or less, I often lose control of my life
Crown: When the Crown Prince disappeared on his sixteenth birthday, he left his kingdom in chaos. Ten years later, peace has finally begun to settle-- until a series of demon attacks hit a local dinery and threaten to unravel its chefs' secrets one at a time. In which a magician, a prince and a hero walk into a restaurant...
Crustal: It can't be that hard to find a new second guitarist, can it? Well for a group of gay men it is. Especially after the collaboration with the original member didn't end too well, "Daddy Bear Corporation" is running out of options and fast. That's until a stranger applies to their band. She's nothing they were expecting or even looking for, but despite each of their own prejudice, she's given a chance. Story is somewhat inspired by K-ON!
CrystalDream: A young girl is begin hunted by a creature from her nightmares.
CrystalQuest: A group of six kirbies adventure around helping others, facing monsters, and forming strong friendships.
CrystalShadows: It's just a typical love story... ...or is it, really?
Cubicle: Glen has worked a nine-to-five office job for the last decade, and has hated every single second of it. What will happen when he finally breaks? CupidsQuest: Warning: This is in fact a Yaoi/BL/BoysLove comic Axle Reddit is kind of an asshole and a bully, but even he has feelings. On the day he finally brings forth the courage to confess to his crush, Elle, he pisses off the wrong person and is cursed to become cupid and must grant love to the citizens of his town via heart-shaped arrowhead while wearing a cute frilly dress. Only when he admits to truly falling in love with someone and they do so in return will he be able to pass on his curse to someone else. Now if only Malcomb, the new guy from down the street, didn't honestly believe Axle was a girl while he goes about his 'Cupid Duties' and wasn't slowly falling for him.
CupofOlea: Cup of Olea is a text-based adventure game inspired by Lunar Hill! Take command of Cliff Gradel and his friends to serve your land and your king! And don't worry if you get confused; it makes the adventure that much more fun. Just submit a command on the latest page and see what happens! Updates Wednesdays and Sundays. Don't be afraid of the page count! It reads quickly!
CurseLineage: Read from right to left. Ayla Exonuke, A young Yuzcazi is being chased by the Kirimangalou Empire, They think she is the last one of a long-lost lineage. Together with her brother Kokei (not related by blood) They try to survive to the empire attacks and any other things that get in their way. Genre:Action,Adventure,Fantasy. release schedule: Thursday.
Cutoff: Chloe is a walk-on of B-movies. In the movie where she plays a corpse, she tries somehow to attract the eye of director Peter Cohen. But Peter doesn't care about her...he's crazy about Ines, the main actress of his movie ! This comic was started in 2008.
CuzICan: "I want my own editor when I graduate." "You aren't allowed to reveal yourself until you're finished with college." DEAL Now that graduation is done with, our ghostwriter has gotten her wish. However, the new editor might be in for a real ride with this award winning ghost. This story deals with some controversy that I wonder about and deal with so don't be offended by my views...oh yeah and this deals with lesbians.
CyberSteelFarewell: Alex and Kevin are friends and they live together since they were 21 years old, until Kevin decided to get in trouble. The two were separated: Alex ended up in the hands of a ruthless killer known as Anger, and Kevin puts his life in the hands of Jelom and Upper, the first a Palestinian guy who always wears a gas mask and the other an African-American middle-aged man with a passion for firearms. Alex is imprisoned and Anger forces him to kill for a living, while Jelom convinces Kevin that the real enemy is just his friend Alex. Kevin is not convinced of this hypothesis and he makes sure that Alex will come back to live with him and his group, but the young killer shows impatience towards the solitary life they impose to him and, with an excuse, he decides to go away. ** THE OLD COMIC (+18) IS FULLY AVAILABLE AT: cybersteelcomic.tumblr.com
DAI: Completion: Not complete. Art Style: Manga/cartoon, color Read Style: Western (Left to right) Age Group: 13+ (some adult themes and sexuality) Genre: Romance, supernatural Synopsis: The story of a dog and a cat who become human and fall in love while learning to live life in their new forms. DBON: An 8 issue long crossover manga of Shounen Jump classics, Dragonball Z, Bleach, One Piece and Naruto. that i did a little while back as something iv always wanted to do/see, and also practice for my own original long running manga Ryak-Lo (Reads Right to Left) this is a fan comic, all characters belong to their respective creators.
DBZNewSayainsofEarth: The sayains who took the place of the original Z Fighters after they all passed away. -credits to the owners of the sprites not made by me.
DEGAF: Death God Alchemists from the Future (DEGAF) is a (hopefully) humorous magical girl manga spoof about an ordinary girl named Britney. When a Death God possesses her cat, she learns that her destiny is to lead a magical girl team with fruit related powers. And probably save the world or something. Inter-dimensional demons are involved. Possibly an evil Alchemist. Plot Cat's a little fuzzy on the details... The characters are loosely based on myself and my friends (some of which are not represented by their correct genders). The quality of art has increased over time, but rather than try to redo the original pages, I will focus my energy on furthering the story. Updates Thursdays
DEMENTED: // Warning 18+ Only: BL, Violence, Strong Language // We're all going to Hell eventually. But what happens if you've taken a visit to it and a certain little someone followed you back on Earth..? CHAOS ensues. Take a ride with Slayne, a killer-for-hire where everyday is the worst day of his life~
DEMONOLOGY: Skinny jeans, greasy hair drooling devils from the past cross this red line if you dare will never end what shall last... Update - every monday
DETENTIONHarryDracoDoujin: DRARRY gag What really happens in detention... Disclaimer: The boys are, sadly, not mine. ©J.K. Rowling
DIESISTKRIEG1GlaubigkeitHuter: A tamed nazi story in Romanian about two friends from Neumarkt. Accidents happens, and a price is paid during war. Ernst von Mortenberg, ex-politician of Germany, goes in Romania (Transylvania) for a colonel post in Neumarkt's military base. He spends there some time with his friend, Josef Hanzen, talking about a strange dog that visits the place. Then, suddenly, they are attacked by the Russians, and Ernst is the only survivor of the attack, after that, he is deported in Schassburg where he meets a family friend that will help him go to Poland... The manga will be out for purchasing in September 1st 2011
DRUNK: The aftermath of a good night in - except the hangover's yet to kick in...
DTricked: D-Tricked follows the life of two not so remarkable high school students, Benjy Decker and Dory Dietrich, as they face rather remarkable challenges and have to learn to see the world in a new light the hard way.
DaddysGirl: Andy doesn't go looking for fights -- they always seem to find her. She's learned the hard way to appreciate how easily life can be taken from others, and tries her best to be a friendly pacifist. But sometimes fighting is the only option, especially when she gets on the bad side of a violent money launderer. Daddy's Girl (almost always) updates every three days.
DaemonTheTravelersSymposium: The End has come and gone. Bickering nations - unable to resolve their differences - figuratively dropped the bomb without deploying a single nuclear warhead.
