THINGS THE READERS SHOULD KNOW: -CONTAINS sex (But sorry, no porn). -Nudity. -Naughty Language. -Clichés/Stereotypes! -Teenage AAAANGST! -Characters of varying opinions. -Violence with people and animals. -All around dissatisfaction. I love critique, if you see anything wrong feel free to point it out! C: <3
WackyKirby: A lot of things can happen... You never know what kind of adventures life has in store for Kirby. Follow him on his latest endeavors and find out!
Wakako: Wakako is a cheerful Japanese high school student whose classmate is a robot and father is in cohorts with vicious gangsters.
WakeEcho: After an encounter with a soul-stealing shadow, Arial sets off on a journey to reclaim what he has lost. However, his task is much more complicated than he bargains for, and he quickly begins to learn the consequences of wandering into the dark...
WalfasShenanigans: Syo messes with Walfas and posts the results here. And lets other people join in on the madness.
WalkAwayfromtheSun: The world has always been filled with mystery and wonder. Some of them had already been solved, others are still unsolved to this very day. It is such mysteries that makes us wonder what the world really holds. Find out what wonders shall be discover as a group of travelers set out into the great unknown, destined to travel the world and see these mysteries unfold.
Wander: Three young ladies meet each other through circumstances absurd and unavoidable. Friendship formed (despite any attempts to prevent it) they wander through their world, traveling to new places and having adventures. Piper has to avenge her ex girlfriend's broken heart. Arilsden has to seek out her own path, not follow her family's footsteps. Fantz wants this itch on her butt to go away. Updates Mondays and Thursdays.

Wandomlagalaxiaperdida: sci fi comic my blog: rafaelcarrasco.blogspot.com
WantedDeadorDead: Two greedy undead bandits cause havoc in the wild west until one day a misterious little girl in a weird outfit hires them in order to help her father. Demons, monsters and wild west action! Beware of violence and foul language. Read L-->R Updates: Wednesday and Friday. Comment plz! :3
WarBuddies: The backdrop: Intergalactic alien war. The characters: A medic and her senior officer. This was originally done as a side comic for my main webcomic Inhuman, and as a gift to the recently broken up band Harvey Danger. It is based off of their song by the same name. The band is aware of the comic and is okay with its existance. In fact, in perhaps the greatest justification of my comicking ever, I met the drummer of Harvey Danger on their farewell tour in Brooklyn and he informed me he has all of the pages printed out and hung up in his office! the comic was done with micron pens & watercolours and with a very limited colour set intentionally. i used only blacks, greys, yellows and browns. even when it looks red, that was brown paint. brown paint and a really wonky scanner.
WarHounds: War Hounds is a walk in dirt and rust. It's wandering in the worst districts of the universe. And trying to come out alive, if possible in one piece. It's a webcomic published every fridays.
WarWizard: Jitu Jeusi is coming, and he's bringing war with him! A creature born of hell and earth, magic and blood, Jitu now fights to erase the dark stain of his family's legacy and defend those who cannot defend themselves!
WarioIsGreat: This was originally intended to be an animation series (and it still is, check it out here: https://www.youtube.com/user/256pi/videos), however, the animations proved to be increasingly difficult to make, and I found myself totally unmotivated. Luckily, I had all the episodes I had planned in comic form, and these WAY outnumbered the animations, so I decided to scan them and make a webcomic out of them. So here we are. Wario Is Great stars quite obviously everyone's favorite Nintendo-originated fat garlic-eater, Wario. Since this comic was originally formatted to become an animation series, it's separated not by page, but by episode. Each episode was drawn on loose-leaf notebook paper, usually consisting of two pages front and back, with 15 panels on each side (sometimes less on the back). Occasionally there are also episodes that are double-length. If you're looking for a comic that's just a good laugh, and you don't care much about how it looks, you've come to the right place. I hope you enjoy it.
Warmface: Ollie Suave was raised by the dead. On his 30th birthday he's contractually obligated to become a cold face, and party the rest of his undead life in a zombie run speakeasy. At least, that was the plan before he met Sally, a living girl. Ollie may be content with dying but Sally, and her friends Harry, Mark and Elizabeth, aren't about to let it happen. Especially not when he seems to be the only one who can stop shadow monsters appearing around town. Warmface will begin sometime in the near future. Stay tuned for updates, livestreams, and concept art. (And, yes, this comic will include boys that kiss boys, if that's why you're here)
WaroftheDogs: A junkie alcoholic nuclear physicist from the military decides to try to take over the world during its most vulnerable state: the apocalypse. If you like gay mad scientists, this comic is for you.
WarpedSerendipity: Ladania grew up seeing things that werent supposed to be seen. All through elementary, middle and high school, she was bullied for being strange - many even thought she was insane. But eventually, and with the help of her best friend, Zoey, Ladania was able to ignore the odd images and live a normal life. However, just as her long-time crush is about to take her out on a first date, Ladania is pulled away and is forced to acknowledge, once again, that what she sees is not only real, but is also in real danger. WARNING: This comic contains mild colorful language, hilariousness, an awesome story plot and hot bishi-men. You have been warned.
WarriorcatsIntotheWild: WARNING. BLOOD AND VIOLENCE. WarriorofLight: When the world will be under the reign of the darkness come the time of his arrival , the time of decisive battle . The Great Warrior will fight against powers of evil and give back PEACE and LIGHT .( The oldest legend ) New page - every Friday .
WasItBANDIT: 24 Hour comic made in 2012 In Finnish only. Kahden homoidiootin tarina kun he taistelevat sarjavitsejÃ¤ ja slendermanalienia vastaan, eli juuri mitÃ¤ 24h-sarjiksessa saa olla.
Washouts: Washouts is a retro SF stand-alone story about a group of hapless female adventurers.
WastelandersAnonymous: A scavenger, a zombie, and a plague doctor travel in a post apocalyptic world and have adventures and crap.
Wayfar: In the middle of nowhere, surrounded by a really big wall, rests Hometown. Here, the metal faced Teks rule and act as a constant reminder of the people’s place in the world – in town and without question. Be efficient, productive and avoid wasting time and mind on trivialities. Under the two suns, in an out-of-the-way part of town, two friends are content making art.

WeAreGolden: "We are not what you think we are, we are golden" (Mika, We are Golden 2009) A story of self-discovery, sexuality and relationships. When Olivia Barclay was forced to move from her high class private school to a scummy comprehensive it felt like the end of the world. But it was only the beginning... (God, anyone want some wine with that cheese? I'm really no good at taglines!) Warning: contains examples of British humour. If there's any slang you don't understand, just ask :) Also, yaoi, yuri, het and any other kind of relationships you can think of. Updated Wednesday and Sunday. Mostly.
WeCare: The Magical protectors of Earth known as care bears are defeated, sealed into crystals and scattered, allowing darkness to take control. Now it's up to the newly awakened Tenderheart to save the rest of the care bears, purify the darkness, and defeat the evil sorceror Noheart! Annoyed by the problems these monsters cause (and out of pure boredom one weekend) Guppy and his ragtag misfit friends formed the "Weather Wackers", a special club dedicated to fighting the monsters on a regular basis. Join Guppy and his friends adventures as they go through life, fantasy, and danger.
Wedidntdoanythingfor4years: In a summer camp near an atom reactor happens strange things. The particular city is called Eszretlek Aht Land. The scouts heard some strange noises at night. One of them will go in the direction of the noise, but amid screams in scared returns.
WelcometoFreakshow: The audience roars, the acrobats and performers provide them with a spectacle unrivaled in all of Europe. The lights die, and the audience is now the entertainment for the apathetic circus. As blood and bone rush to the surface, one man leads the troupe downward to the darkest ring of all. Welcome to the Freakshow. //Updates Every Friday//
WelcometoalcaturyBook1: A short story on how an earthling got abducted, is it a galactic scheme? Perhaps a demonic joke? or fate, if there is such a thing, the whole concept is bullocks. Not only must he conquer his fears, he must also contend with a little battlefield drama, too! Loosely based off the FurAffinity/DeviantArt art-and-RP community of the same name.

The Comic is heavily influenced by Hummingbirds, Clerks, Edge of Pizza, Bar'd, etc. ] Cameo's Always Welcome! WhaleKingKingofWhales: Whale King, King of Whales is a monarch that spends his time throwing axes at people, hanging out with the US President, and making his estranged wife run the kingdom all by herself. Our protagonist, ladies and gentlemen.
WhatAboutLove: Takao has had a secret crush on his classmate, Hisoka, since he first entered high school. Now it's Takao's last year and he figures it's now or never so he does the crazy thing and confesses. Much to his surprise, Hisoka agrees to be his boyfriend. Takao is in pure bliss... until he realizes Hisoka has different aims. While Takao wants an actual relationship all Hisoka seems to be interested in is, well, physical stuff. So now Takao has to figure out a way to make Hisoka see him in a different way, but that's not easy since other men (realizing Hisoka goes that way) have taken an interest. Can Takao fend off potential rivals and get the guy he loves to love him back while facing all the other drama that comes with high school? Probably not, but that won't stop him from trying! Warning: - This is a Yaoi comic. I think that should be self-explanatory, but that means man on man action.
WhatIFoundattheRiver: This story was created for the Yen Press Talent Search 2011. So, copy paste from Anette!: Reading from left to right until you get to the middle of the comic and you will have read the story from Rains point of view (the part I will be posting here), while if you read the other way (and thereby reading Anettes part) you will get Matts point of view. But during class he has a special treat, Rain, a redhead with both tattoos and piercings, is also attending and Matt just can't seem to keep his eyes away. *This comic is a little special, I made it with a friend, Sandra, and the printed version can be read in two ways. Reading from right to left until you get to the middle of the comic and you will have read the story from Matts point of view (the part I will be posting here), while if you read the other way (and thereby reading Sandras part) you will get Rains point of view.
WhenSheWasBad: For every story about a hero, there is a "bad guy". Only, this story isn't about the hero. It's about the smart-alec, tough-as-nails villain. WhereaboutsOfTime: Inuyasha (c) Rumiko Takahashi Kagome Chronicles-Whereabouts of Time(c) matsujun4me aka Catherine Fermin Sukujou & Renkayasha(c) matsujun4me So this is my story: Whereabouts of Time or WOT for short. WhiteHeart: "Lady Love received a magical book of the dark powers to her hands, and summoned a great, divine spirit. The spirit promises that Lady can make one wish, if she catches all the eight special albino souls and brings them to the spirit. Greedy Lady accepts the mission, and so the bloody collecting of albino humans begin... White is a tough and intense young man from the streets. He has been running away from Lady ever since when Love killed his gang and beloved. White is thirsty for revenge, but can do nothing but run away from Love and her henchmen... However, White finally meets Black, a friendly musician, who takes White with him and wants to help him in any way he possibly can. Both of them become good friends, but living in the same apartment makes both of them feel something stronger than just friendship..." WARNING: This comic contains gay relationships, sex, blood, swearing, crying and angsting, confusing scenes, drama and possible grammar mistakes. NOTICE! I started the comic in 2008, so the first four chapters are pretty awful to read... but please bear it, 'cause I'm saving all the re-drawn pages for the possible-author's edition.
WhiteNoise: Warning: Shoujo/Shojo Story about the lives of 4 individuals. ~ Romance/Humour ~ Read from left to right >>>>>
WhiteVelvet: Kyle, a young man of nineteen is about to meet a woman that will alter his life forever. A one-shot full color slice of life romance/drama/coming of age comic. Warning: some nudity and sexual situations (nothing explicit, though), some violence and some cursing.
Whiteminus: You go to a club. Pick up a nice girl. Sleep with her. Wake up discovering she has a psychopath gangster big bother with a sister complex. R+18 : sexual content, visual violence, "yaoi".
WhodHaveKnown: Some people are just in denial of how close they really are. Join Noel and Snow as they learn more about their passion for each other, while their friends try to give them a clue. Updates whenever it can!

WhycantthePrincessmarrytheHero: The Kingdom of Drachenheim is under attack by a dragonoid. A conscription has been exacted by the King himself: All male firstborn of right age shall be provided, may it be from a family of 'Nobles' up to 'Peasants' to ensign for the campaign and slay the dragon. Most unfortunate, the campaign, led by Heroes, regarded as sons of nobles who have been sufficed by training and the best of weaponry, all failed. There is, however, a single person left in the battlefield. Only carrying the cheapest of an Armor, a rusty Zweihander, and the name of Alexis Zimmermann, will a humble child of a carpenter save the Kingdom?
WildExhibit: A humorous comic about the adventures of Stafforshire University's Cartoon & Comic Arts students at the Potteries Museum.
WildWingBoys: It's the original Wild Wing Boys, never before seen in its entirety on the Internet! Follow the wacky hijinks of the Gundam Wing characters with sandwich obsessions, meat collecting, and cameos a-plenty! Updates when I can get around to it because school is killer.
WildWingBoysKoathArc: When a freak dimensional portal sends the five main characters of Gundam Wing into a fantasy world and puts Heero in a coma, the four remaining pilots, accompanied by a young catboy named Toko, must conquer various obstacles in finding a cure...and a way home.
Wildflowers: A web comic about love, life, and trying to comes to terms with being transgender. Sometimes dark, sometimes light, and always an attempt at a honest look at transexual life. Updating every day, including weekends!
WiltedPegasus: The most terrifying place is inside your very own head, and the pesanta knows what's in there, even better than you do. ________________ Warnings & notes: Read from left to right. The author of the specific comic is non-native speaker of English; text includes grammatical errors. Content is generally suitable for ages 16 and up. May contain intense violence, blood and gore, sexual content and/or strong language. Improvised, experimental comic project.
Wings: Michelle is a high school girl who often suffers from periods of depression. Her depression keeps her from being able to work on "Wings," a novel she's attempting to write. As she struggles with writing, Michelle finds out that she has wings of her own that can take her to dangerous heights.
WingsOverEthereal: [Comic is on break while I prep for more Crisis of the Ancients pages, see you on the 25th!] The age-old fantasy story of a boy and a princess, yet a tale unlike any other... ********************************************* Set in the fictional world of Chrona, "Wings Over Ethereal" is a twisting tale of love and hate set in two Kingdoms living with the tension of an ever-present threat of war. While the beings of these kingdoms go on with their lives either fearing war or welcoming it, they remain blind to the true darkness that seeks to change the course of their world forever. The fate of these two Kingdoms, and perhaps the entire world, rests in the Love between a Human... And an Angel... *********************************************
WingsTurnedtoDust: Sei, Noruku, and Kana were all born with a touch of animal parts, which is actually quite common in their world! Unfortunately for the bunch, their powers that come with the cute ears and tail combo aren't all that welcome by ones born without them. As they train to get stronger for reasons unknown to them, they begin to realize what dangers lie ahead of them as the world opens up and shows its true colors, challenging their friendship and family bonds. Want to support this comic? Physical copies of each completed book are available, as well as merchandise! Book 1 - http://www.lulu.com/shop/spoony-and-murphy/wings-turned-to-dust-book-1/paperback/product-17447851.html Book 2 - http://www.lulu.com/shop/spoony-and-murphy/wings-turned-to-dust-book-2/paperback/product-20665472.html Merchandise - http://flurryofschemingdestiny.spreadshirt.com/
WinterGrave: Done for the 2013 24 hour comic challenge.
WinterStorm: A young spirit who brings winter to the forest each year lets his curiosity get the best of him. Storm is a 6 page comic. It's more event than story arc, but it's full color, with some light touches of animation. updates tuesday & thursday
Wired: Wired is a sci-fi webcomic based in a futuristic society where androids and humans live side-by-side. Strict laws are laid out to protect humanity from the potential dangers of their mechanical counterparts - the most notable of these being that any android found to be active without a human owner will be categorised as a 'rogue' and must be destroyed. Rikani Sheridan has everything the average man would usually have - a wife, a good job, a nice house. Except he's not entitled to any of them - he is forbidden, because he's a rogue android living undercover as a human. Rikani has no memories beyond the last three years, having woken up in an alleyway with no clue of who or what he was, but once the authorities track him down, he soon discovers what he was created for - and this realisation could destroy everything he knows. Wired is also being released in novel format - it has been accepted by a publisher and I'm working on the final draft while also creating the comic. It's the same story, told in two different ways. I hope you'll enjoy it. c: Currently updating Thursdays.
WisdomoftheFish: Ah, sunny days! A whimsical adventure brews when a pair of twins, Yin and Yang, find themselves ditching their studies on a bright afternoon.
WitchWoodoo: A short comic about a witch, a dumb assistant and a girl who doesn't believe in magic. READING DIRECTION IS FROM RIGHT TO LEFT!
WitchsGirl: Casey Mirandez lived a normal life in small little Blue Field County, until one day, a stranger from "Far off" brings something new to her Plain Jane Life.
WolfWolf: The daily lives of an ordinary group of friends: Mafer, The carnivorous Woman. London, The helpless romantic gamer. German, Hairstylist by day, Boxer by night. Elena, Possible Robot. Mayo, Japanophile psychopath. Vidal, Cross-dresser. Jose Maria, 24 FPS Dreamer. Updates: Twice a week. (random) Genre: Seinen; Daily life, Comedy, Super Robot, Romance, Tragedy, NTR. Length: 22 episodes.
WolfhowlsAnideaforashortstoryturnedcomic: A long way away from wherever you are, there's a tribe with both odd rules, and odd rulers. When a child is born with wolf ears, they are immediately named 'Wolf Child'. If there are two, they are called 'Wolf Child (Insert name here)'. At the age of 11 the wolf child is released into a hostile forest. If they manage to sing the Sacred Song of the Moon, they gain a tail and are brought home by magic, then later become leader and gain the title of 'Wolf Mother/Father'. This story follows a Wolf Child originally named Sharika. Ten years before her birth, her wolf child brother had been proclaimed dead. The village was terrified because her parents were getting old and they had no heir to the "throne". When she was born, no one knew Sharika had ears. Boy were they in for a surprise... Meanwhile, not too far away from the tribe there was a big city full of big city people. A child, named Genevieve, was born. At the age of three, she started singing. At the young age of 6 she became a well known pop star. Now I must ask, how do you think these girls are connected?
WonderTheatre: Here is my own take of Alice in Wonderland. This is a story about Alfie and Mary-ann, and their encounters of the "Wonder Theatre". One night, while working as a carpenter in an old theatre, Alfie meets Mary-ann, a girl who seems to secretly appear where ever he goes... Just before they become friends, a set of bizarre characters show up in the name of the "Red Prince", to hunt down the mysterious "White Princess". Alfie soon discovers he must protect this White Princess around the clock, without knowing whom she really is... So with the assistance of a rally of mad acquaintances, he has his mirror disguise "Jasper", to use his magic against the "Duchess"'s wrath, while he fools the public into thinking it's all a big mad act! Meanwhile, as Mary-ann holds hope in her father's return, she finds she must use her own magic, in order to inspire and protect her friends, and childhood crush... May the show begin!!
WooHoo: Woo Hoo! is an upbeat cartoon comedy full of colour and energy. The short stories of Woo Hoo! follow a small ensemble cast including Jolee, an aspiring artist from the boonies, and Rhiys, a fringe-dwelling urban parkour master. Together they share adventures in Port Metro, a vibrant Pacific Northwest metropolis.
Wootlabs: "Square Woot is the worst supervillain I ever fought. She held her death ray backwards and vaporized half of her robot army." - Riot Girl, superhero "An uplifting story for anyone that loves cute things in hats." - Penguin Parade Weekly "THIS IS THE STORY OF CATBOT 9000. EVERYONE ELSE IN IT IS STUPID AND NOT CATBOT 9000." - Catbot 9000 Square Woot is a genius with robots, weapons, and that funky little thing called science. Joined by her penguin sidekick and her family of creations, all she wants to do is rule the world. At least, that's all she used to want. A chance encounter has the group thinking that it might be more fun to be heroes from now on. Is the city ready to be saved through mad science?
WorldofClown: Monsters prowl the night. Things go bump in the night. Clowns wreak havoc. One good clown takes it upon himself to restore the good name of his kind. Every Wednesday.
WorldofRandomized: For anyone who wants simple humor, this is your comic! A picture, a subtitle, and a bad joke makes up every comic. It is also seeking co-authors! So join and put up your own randomness.
WorldofWind: Home get's pretty dull sometimes right? Where would you like to go most if you could travel anywhere for a day? Well, it must be pretty nice right? Anyway, It's not as if there is some shady looking airship that could magically transport you to a fantasy land in your employers basement right? so, instead, please enjoy this one-shot, fantasy type comic.
WorldsApartComic: Worlds Apart is a story I worked on for a very long time which I then decided to make it into a webcomic. It's a kind of real life drama fantasy with a tiny bit of romance, a smigeon of humour and a bit of nastiness thrown in. It starts off light but it will get dark and violent in places and at some point it will contain non-graphic m/m sex as well as other mature themes. Anyway, my plan is to update at least two pages a week, at least two days a week. And hopefully my art will improve along the way!
WorstGlitchEver: You like gaming? That's splendid! Lucky for you there's a new game H.T.R.E.A that is fresh off the shelves!! And what's this? A virtual reality helmet?! Put it on, and log in...but be careful, because you might not be able to log out again.
WriteAboutYou: Arthur is a business major who likes to write. Half way through his first year, one of his professors announces that the class would have to write a 'meaningful' term paper as their final exam. Arthur immediately starts on his research, getting caught in a mix-up with June: an Art student, 3 years older. He becomes so intrigued with June and June's life, allowing them to grow close. As Arthur spends time with June, he comes realize what he truly wants in HIS life.
XXMarioAndSonicLegendofSevenStarsandEmer: Mario & Sonic: Legend of Seven Stars and Emerald, the crossover comic of Mario series and Sonic series in together to find the seven legendary crystal stars and emeralds is different than normal Chaos Emeralds and Crystal Stars which is upgraded from the Master Emeralds and Crystal Star. Our two might villains, Bowser and Eggman has planned to take over the two worlds to make on Mario's World as Koopaland and Sonic's World as Eggland, they must stop them before the dream come true, but they MUST to find the seven legendary crystal stars and chaos emeralds to defeat Bowser and Eggman!
XXMoralityXx: Follow the live's of the members of squad 2. The newly graduated Light members, about to go on their first mission, to Fenris Castle. Their goal? To find the Light Princess before the Dark's consumes the world. There will be laughs, tears and love, but can squad 2 finish their mission with out falling to the Dark?
Xanocave: Mr. Angelu, a demon that feeds on souls, comes to Earth to destroy humanity and so dominate a new world inhabited by a superior species created by him, the upright chickens. So he founded the Xanocave, a secret base from which he and his minions will hatch their evil plans, using a blog as a cover.
Xienith: Xienith was Betrayed, being pronounced 'dead' for a few hundred years, and finally awoken after all that time... Will he be able to forgive and forget who did this to him? or will he want to track down and GIVE them what they deserve? With the human who awakened him tagging along as his 'servant', Will Xienith be able to just start anew?? Reads, LEFT TO RIGHT, is BL (boys love), and will contain sexual themes at times, foul language, and some gore.
YAKUZASREVENGEvol1and2: For BOY'S LOVE or YAOI's addicts only please. When a yakuza, Reiji Kuran, meets a gorgeous and mysterious young man, Ranmaru, chased by his worst ennemy, Kodaka, an old and dangerous other yakuza. Violence,sex, death and perhaps love in Tokyo nights...
YOURCORNER: A graphic narrative exploring the preconceptions people have about other cultures or places in their own hometowns, which may hinder new exchanges and experiences. The author writes about New York City, a melting pot of cultures, albeit divided by its own ethnic enclaves.
YadotCakeShop: The oh so popular Yadot Cake Shop has packed up it's things and moved to a new location, still within the area of Canada. The owner, young 16 year old Tai, had to move the shop to another location in order to avoid law issues that would have closed down Yadot forever. Though some employees have been lost the doors are open for more, to ever make more friends and relationships. The Yadot Cake Shop is an all male cafe that has a habit of having it's employee fall in love within it's walls. Besides making amazing cakes and pastries it is also a great source of fanservice. COME AND ENJOY THE SPLENDOR~! :ACCEPTING APPLICATIONS FOR A LIMITED TIME: :WARNING: THERE IS MATURE THEMES WITHIN THIS COMIC, I GUARANTEE :WARNING:

YamanaokiHighSchool: there're a lot of dimensions on this world and Honjitsu is where 8 students will live the adventure of their lives... Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/#!/pages/Yamanaoki/167250876624086 version español: http://yamanaoki.smackjeeves.com be nice 8D
YearZero: Year Zero follows a survivor trapped in his NYC apartment during the zombie apocalypse of 2012.
YingGuo: Often times, we hear about ghost stories and superstitions that entertain or scare us. But what if there really are "Other Beings" that walk among us? Visit the Karma Archive in kurohiko.com!
Ynezissolovely: Ynez Merschen is an average guy who is always crabby and hates a lot of people. Not much folk talk to him due to his stubborn nature; if someone done it s/he could have done it because of his silky voice. Nobody cares why is he like this. Ynez was okay with this so far but a mysterious wolf boy starts to have an interest on him... BL/bad language.
YouAreEverything: BL love story following two teenage boys. The comic will -hopefully- cover problems experienced in the LGBT community in a lighthearted and funny way.
YouAreTheReasonForTheEndOfTheWorld: Based on Norse mythology, the comic follows the Aesir Odin, Freyr, Thor and Loki as they and their children struggle to overcome their fates: to burn and die in the fires of Ragnarok, the so-called Twilight of the Gods. However, the enemies of the Asgard, the Jotun, aren't about to go quietly and they have found a way to twist Fate to their advantage. I started this comic to work on my drawing skills, it's all done by hand, with pencil, pen, ink brush and markers.I try to get a chapter up at the beginning of every month!
YouAskWeReply: PLEASE READ THE WHOLE DESCRIPTION! A Question & Answer comic. Here you can ask any questions to the characters of my comics, 20 Times Kirby and Kirby And The Magic Mirror. You ask, we reply! Everything you need to know is in the news post, and it's also there where you must post your questions. Go there before anything.
YouI: A short story about an extremely shy guy (Toby) and his new friend Keiichi whom he has fallen head over heels in love with.
YouJest: A woman named Vexa and her pet rabbit-fish: Dallas, are hunting down a protective deity called Jesto. Struggling to catch the magical being, Vexa runs into Glaotrix who was cursed by Jesto into becoming a dragon everytime he experiences negative emotion. Read from left to right. I try to update every week.
YouPutz: Christopher arrives home one day to find that his dog Putz is missing. He'll have to enlist the help of his odd friend Gohan in order to find his beloved pooch. ---One Shot--- Story by Kitsunegirl333 and me Art by me <<Read this way<<
YouSerious: bah im a sheep ----- there can be humor, drama, blood and maybe BL(BOYxBOY) cB this will be updated a week Tuesday (1+gmt) and i will put up all the characters sheets up if all of them have been appeared <: have fun!
YouWorryTooMuch: A girl is faced with her boyfriend going into the military. Short story, there will be 18 pages in total when completed. Updates Daily
Youcouldcallmeatomboy: You could call me a tomboy - others have done so before. I don't know about calling myself a tomboy but...well, comics from my life. Updates every Tuesday.
Youkai: Haruki Hikaru and Haruki Nishoku, otherwise known as Blackie and Eclipse, are here in a bit of a spin-off from the "Demon Lover" novel series to educate random people about their culture! Through example, of course, which means dealing with anything from Akakeko to Zorigami. (Except not those two, those two probably won't ever be covered.)
YoungCannibals: The story of one girl's battle NOT to kill her friends. Updates every Monday & Friday.
Yourementallyinsanemydarling: 15-year old Makoto Akiyama seems like your fairly normal high school student. A normal kid with good grades and kind friends, but a strange thing is that he keeps his life at home secret. Though when 16-year old new kid Kazuki Abano enters the school and is befriended by Makoto, what he has been hiding from everyone is soon revealed. WARNING: Blood/Gore Boy's Love (its basically only fluff though) Amazingly bad art IRREGULAR AND/OR DELAYED UPDATES DUE TO LAZINESS AND LIFE PROBLEMS
YukiV1: December 15 is the birth of Yuki Takahashi. The ice princess of the kingdom Colosuss. On Yuki's 7th birthday however, Colosuss was attacked by an evil pyromancer named Mordicai Pyro. Though many ages before this, the war between the dragons and the Colosussians has been going on. Mordicai Pyro destroyed the kingdom which caused Yuki and her parents to be separated. Now at 17 years old, Yuki is now learning that she's part of the zodiac society. Her and 12 other gifted others all fight for each other, their loved ones, or just for the sake of the universe. This manga has action, romance and is suitable for both boys and girls. Enjoy reading!
Yuma: Yuma is seventeen and a normal girl. Just like any other day, Yuma was coming back from school when she suddenly gets hit in the face by a piece of mysterious paper. Then her life started turning weird from there on out.
YuuhisJourney: Yuuhi always wanted to go on a Pokemon adventure since she was little. However, her Mother was very adamant to not let her go. After years of wearing her down, she is finally able to go on her Pokemon Journey with her first Pokemon Pearl! ~Please read Right to Left~ ~Updates Every Wednesdays, Saturdays or whenever I feel like it~ ~Also working on consistency, so please bear with my art at first. I hope to get better along the way. V^V;;~ ------------------- Pokemon is (c) to Nintendo, Game Freaks, and Creatures Inc.
Z: When high school senior Zoe is tapped to give a back-to-school speech in the aftermath of a deadly shooting, she finds herself awakening to life-changing truths about man's inhumanity to man. Z is now available at Lulu.com for in print for $10 USD, and as a download for $2. The print and digital versions include twenty pages of concept art and extensive writer's commentary. http://www.lulu.com/product/paperback/z/15262874 Z is also available for free at our website: www.peardream.com Z is the first title created under the Pear Dream banner, which consists of the same writer/artist team that produced Cerulean Sky and Oyster Choke. We think Z represents a creative step forward, and we hope it finds its intended audience.
ZaenWell: Thrown into the well of the Gods as part of an initiation, Renee Nathans has fourteen days to find a suitable God to bring back into the world of humanity. Danger lurks behind every corner, however, and when a rogue God decides humanity is no longer necessary, an already difficult task becomes even harder...

Zarishtra: When Shona Ria is devastated by a virus that mutates 15% of its population, Zarishtra must figure out what happened while she learns the extent of her abilities and discovers the dark past of her companion Jason 'Fritz' Fritsgerald.
ZeldaShortstories: Just some random little shortstories from the Legend of Zelda game series :] This will update whenever I can think of a new episode. ! Might contain slight BL ! Please ignore the watersigns. I copied the pages from my deviant-Acount ^^; My Twitter-Account: https://twitter.com/mirana_hpage
ZeldaTheNewAdventureofLinkIIMajorasMask: In the land of Termina, in small Clock Town, a carnival is held in honor of the seasons. A looming evil, however, lurks above the town sent by a mischievous Skull Kid wearing a foreboding mask. Now Termina is in need of heroes. Heroes who are willing to traverse the land through dangerous dungeons, defeat terrible enemies and wake the creature that can stop the coming disaster. Once again, join Link and Cloud along with some new friends on their newest adventure to stop the forces of evil... but can even they stop the evil in three days? Updated weekly... usually. Based on the characters and story created and owned by Nintendo. Final Fantasy characters owned by Square Enix. Other characters parodied shown belong to their respective owners.
Zelsen: The prince has declared war against the druids because they have taken away a future where he was happy. Since then his only though is to destroy all of them, but one fateful day he meets a Zelsen which marks the beginning of the end. The melody like love beckons to be free from its gilded cage. This is a BL story.(Updated weekly) Genres: magic, fantasy, romance, drama. Themes: yaoi, smut, bishounen, tragedy
Zenchav: The son of a fallen angel strives to live a normal life as a human but finds himself forever haunted by the ghost of his father's desires. In his inescapable destiny of suffering he falls deeper into the depths of darkness becoming the enemy of the Earth and mankind. Updates on Wednesday.
ZeroKing: A boys dream world becomes a reality as he fights to get back home.
Zerocool: "zero cool" is my take on the superhero genre. I'm a fan of superhero comics but I grow tired of reading how much of a burden it is to have superpowers. The main character acquires superpowers and loves it! Wouldn't you? The comic was originally setup as a daily newspaper strip with six black and white strips followed by a larger, color "Sunday" strip. Recently I switched to full color comic book style pages. I like it, so I'm sticking with it. "zero cool" updates on Saturday.
ZeylonDefenders: Zeylon Defenders is an ongoing sci-fi webcomic that chronicles the adventures of a team of agents who seek out and stop evildoers throughout the Zeylon Galaxy. It normally updates once a week, but when I'm in college there is no set schedule for pages since my classwork comes first.
ZombiiSkool: Zombii Skool is a comic about a science experiment gone wrong, and how four students find their way through their 3 story school for an escape. They face many "zombii" obstacles including the "Zombii Boss." And with this, Arthur must lead his friends to safety no matter what it takes.
ZyraSlash: Young Zyra Slash volunteers for a dangerous rite-of-passage that requires being catapulted into a strange new world. Once there, he must absorb the world's culture and become one with the natives. When Zyra lands in this weird new land and is greeted by a native, he finds out this oddball planet is named "Earth".
_A_: "A" is a light story of how a young girl, Ryza Hartfelt, learns how to deal with infatuation, stress, friendship, and an unknown person who calls himself "A". At first, she dislikes "A" for being a stalker, but that soon changes as she goes through a journey of self-discovery with him. This manga series was completed on July 10, 2013 Please read from right to left ^^
